00036 
00040   virtual ~Mock() {}
00041 
00047   virtual void begin(byte cols, byte rows) {
00048     Serial.print("BEGIN ");
00049     Serial.print(cols);
00050     Serial.print(' ');
00051     Serial.println(rows);
00052   }
00053 
00057   virtual void home() {
00058     Serial.println("HOME");
00059   }
00060 
00064   virtual void clear() {
00065     Serial.println("CLEAR");
00066   }
00067 
00073   virtual void setCursor(byte col, byte row) {
00074     Serial.print("CURSOR ");
00075     Serial.print(col);
00076     Serial.print(' ');
00077     Serial.println(row);
00078   }
00079 
00087   virtual size_t write(uint8_t ch) {
00088     Serial.print("WRITE ");
00089     if ((0x21 <= ch) && (ch <= 0x7e)) {
00090         Serial.print('\'');
00091         Serial.write((char)ch);
00092         Serial.println('\'');
00093      } else {
00094         Serial.print("0x");
00095         Serial.println(ch, HEX);
00096       }
00097     return 1;
00098   }
00099 
00106   virtual Read read() {
00107     char ch = (Serial.available() > 0) ? Serial.read() : '\0';
00108     Read sample;
00109     switch (ch) {
00110       case 'h':
00111       case 'H':
00112           sample = LEFT;
00113           break;
00114       case 'j':
00115       case 'J':
00116         sample = DOWN;
00117         break;
00118       case 'k':
00119       case 'K':
00120         sample = UP;
00121         break;
00122       case 'l':
00123       case 'L':
00124         sample = RIGHT;
00125         break;
00126       case ' ':
00127       case '\n':
00128       case '\t':
00129         sample = SELECT;
00130         break;
00131       default:
00132         sample = NONE;
00133         break;
00134     }
00135     return sample;
00136   }
00137 
00138 };

00152 class DFRobot
00153 : public com::diag::amigo::Display
00154 {
00155 
00156 protected:
00157 
00158   LiquidCrystal & lcd;
00159 
00160 public:
00161 
00165   DFRobot(LiquidCrystal & hardware) : lcd(hardware) {}
00166 
00170   virtual ~DFRobot() {}
00171 
00177   virtual void begin(byte cols, byte rows) { lcd.begin(cols, rows); }
00178 
00182   virtual void home() { lcd.home(); }
00183 
00187   virtual void clear() { lcd.clear(); }
00188 
00194   virtual void setCursor(byte col, byte row) { lcd.setCursor(col, row); }
00195 
00203   virtual size_t write(uint8_t ch) { return lcd.write(ch); }
00204 
00211   virtual Read read() {
00212     Read sample;
00213     int key = analogRead(0);
00214     if      (key > 1000) sample = NONE;
00215     else if (key < 50)   sample = RIGHT;
00216     else if (key < 195)  sample = UP;
00217     else if (key < 380)  sample = DOWN;
00218     else if (key < 555)  sample = LEFT;
00219     else if (key < 790)  sample = SELECT;
00220     else                 sample = NONE;
00221     return sample;
00222   }
00223 
00224 };

00460 void setup() {
00461   Serial.begin(9600);
00462   lc100.begin();

00465 
00475 void loop () {
00476   while (Serial.available() > 0) {
00477     lc100.write(Serial.read());
00478   }
00479   char buffer[4];
00480   if (lc100.read(buffer) > 0) {
00481     Serial.print(buffer);
00482   }
00483 }
